definition: A vehicle with four wheels that people use to drive from one place to another.
example_sentence: I drive my car to work every day.

definition: A flying animal that is active at night, or a piece of equipment used in games like baseball.
example_sentence: The bat flew out of the cave at sunset.

definition: A long, solid piece of material or a place where people can drink and socialize.
example_sentence: We went to the bar to have some drinks with friends.
